disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Martial Poise.

blurb.value: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

description.value: Innate: Kalista's basic attack has unique properties: Deals 90% AD physical damage. Misses if she loses sight of her target before they hit. Is unstoppable. Can switch targets mid attack windup. Makes her dash in the target direction after issuing a movement command during a windup or right after casting Pierce. The distance scales with her Boots tier. The windup while dashing is only reduced by 0.66% per  1% bonus attack speed.

description2.value: Innate - Oathsworn Bond: Kalista begins the game with an exclusive Black Spear.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The dash speed is affected by movement speed modifiers and so it will be reduced by slow.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Pierce.

blurb.value: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

description.value: Active: Kalista hurls a spear in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit.

description2.value: If Pierce kills its target the spear continues onward transferring all of the dead victim's Rend stacks to the next enemy it hits. This can repeat indefinitely until the spear reaches its maximum range.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Pierce will cast from wherever Kalista is at the end of the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Sentinel.

blurb.value: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

description.value: Passive - Soul-Marked: While Kalista and her Oathsworn are linked, their basic attacks and Pierce apply a Soul-Mark to their targets.

description2.value: If both Soul-Marks are applied within 4 seconds, the target takes bonus magic damage (capped against non-champions), and cannot be Soul-Marked for 10 seconds. Soul-Mark deals 75 minimum damage to minions and executes them if they're below  125 health. Kalista applies the damage on-attack while the Oathsworn's damage occurs on-hit.

leveling2.value: Bonus Magic Damage:»14 / 15 / 16 / 17 / 18% of target's maximum health«Maximum Non-Champion Damage:100 / 125 / 150 / 175 / 200

description3.value: Passive: Kalista periodically stocks a Sentinel charge, up to a maximum of 2.

description4.value: Active: Kalista summons a Sentinel to patrol along the area in the target direction.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Soul-Marked's bonus damage is credited to Kalista and will benefit from both her  magic penetration and spell effects. If her Oathsworn ally scores a kill using Soul-Marked's bonus damage they will get a message stating 'Kill Secured' in place of the usual gold pop-up (the gold itself is credited to Kalista). The Sentinel's sight reveal on enemy champions is accredited for assists and potentially kills (if they die shortly after being spotted). It does not reveal stealthed targets. Sentinel will cast from wherever Kalista is at the end of the cast time. PENDING FOR TEST: Soul Mark's interaction with parrying effects ( dodge, block, blind). PENDING FOR TEST If Pierce kills the target by Soul-Mark's additional damage, it will/will not continue.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Rend.

effect radius.value: 1100

blurb.value: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

description.value: Passive: Kalista's basic attacks on-hit and Pierce each lodge a spear in the target for 4 seconds, stacking up to 254 times.

description2.value: Active: Kalista rips all lodged spears from valid nearby enemies, dealing physical damage and slowing them for 2 seconds. The damage is increased with additional spears, but with reduced efficiency. Rend deals 50% reduced damage against epic monsters.

description3.value: Rend resets its  cooldown and refunds  mana if it kills at least one target.

description4.value: There must be at least one valid target nearby for Rend to be cast.

description5.value: Rend can be used during the dash of Martial Poise and the cast time of Pierce. In-flight spears and Pierce if in cast will be empowered to apply Rend's effects to their targets. These empowered spears can also trigger Rend's refund.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Rend at maximum stacks will deal a total of 2550 / 3572 / 4847 / 6375 / 8156 (+ 5069.4 / 6068.244 / 7016.994 / 7965.744 / 8914.494% AD) physical damage. Rend cannot activate on untargetable enemies. Rend applies it's effects instantly on cast. The cooldown will not reset if the target is protected by resurrection effects. If Rend is used against Sion under the effects of Glory in Death, the cooldown will reset even if it does not kill him. A stack is not applied if the attack is dodged, blocked or missed while Kalista is blinded. PENDING FOR TEST: Pierce does not apply a stack of Rend if blocked by spell shield.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Fate's Call.

blurb.value: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to Launch toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

description.value: Active: Kalista invokes her link, retrieving her Oathsworn and cleansing them from all crowd control while rendering them invulnerable and untargetable for 4 seconds.

description2.value: Kalista's Oathsworn can dash with displacement immunity to a target location during this time, and automatically does so at the end of the duration, ending Fate's Call's effects and stopping at the first enemy champion hit, knocking up all surrounding enemies and landing themselves at their  basic attack range relative to the target hit.

description3.value: The Oathsworn is vanished, silenced, and unable to perform movement or attack commands until they have emerged.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.value: Oathsworn Ally / Enemies
affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The following will defer Fate's Call's effects at the time of cast to the end of their duration if the Oathsworn is: In cast time. Channeling (with the exception of Recall, Realm Warp, and The Culling). Fate's Call cannot be cast if it is one of a select few movement channels. Displacement immune. Performing Chaaaaaaaarge!!!, Stormbringer, Transformation, or Umbral Trespass. * Fate's Call's drag is deferred if the Oathsworn is dashing. Fate's Call will pull the Oathsworn even if they are untargetable. Fate's Call is disabled if the Oathsworn is resurrecting. Fate's Call can be used even if the Oathsworn is in a zombie state. The Oathsworn being held is represented by a light over Kalista's head. Kalista's death does not cancel Fate's Call.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
